message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. It's a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. It's a great product, but I'm on a budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $11000. It's a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $9000 for the product.

I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $10200. It's a small step closer to your budget, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $9800 for the product.

I understand you're getting closer to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $10000. It's the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to you.
